answers.answer: I had some of the same symptoms. Please go to another dr. You need some test. Have you told your dr about your dads MS?

question: Hi,I am 39 years old and have been experiencing some weird symptoms..  I have had a numbness and tight muscle type of feeling in my left foot for a couple of years now but in the last few months the symptoms have gotten worse.  I now have the same tingling, muscle tightness in my left foot and calf but I also have the tingling in my face, my arm, my hand, and occassionally on my right side now (but mostly my left).   I also get a weird sensation that feels like something is crawling on my leg or arms.  In addition to that my left thumb quivers from time to time and I feel like I lack coordination on the left side.  I walk fine and still function normally.  I just don't feel right.  I also get a loud ringing in my ears from time to time.    I have been to the doctors and mentioned the tingling and numbness but I think my doctor thinks it's anxiety and shrugs it off.Having said all of that here is a little more about me.   I have Type 1 diabetes which I was daignosed with approximately 2 years ago (late diagnoses)..  My daughter was diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes at almost the exact same time.  My Mom passed away early this year very suddenly of a brain tumor and my Dad has MS.   I am turning here because I don't know what to think.  I don't talk to anyone close to me about it because I don't want to sound like there's constantly something wrong which is how I feel that I've made people feel about me this year.  For the most part I think I am doing well with everything but of course I have some stress still.  I go the gym and try to eat healthy and keep myself healthy and upbeat.  I take vitamins and supplements as well.  Yet I still have these issues.  Can someone give me some advice or have you experienced anything similar?Thanks for any answers and have a great day!
title: Please Help!  Numbness, Tingling, Bugs Crawling feeling
